text.tspan: 1. Browser loads the Discover client app and API auth tokens (JWTs)
2. Extension client app uses the SDK to signal Discover and retrieve its API auth token
- If the extension provided a private key, Discover wraps the API auth token in a signed JWT
3. Extension client app uses the SDK to make API calls from the browser (SDK handles auth)
4. Extension client app passes the API auth token to its webserver
5. Extension webserver makes server-to-server API calls
